nifti2glb.name: Nifti to GLB generation
nifti2glb.title: Generic bone segmentation
nifti2glb.description: This pipeline utilises a marching cube algorithm to generate a 3D model from a series of CT scans. As it performs the segmentation based on Hounsfield units, it is agnostic to the specific body site.

dicom2glb.name: DICOM to glb generation
dicom2glb.title: Generic bone segmentation
dicom2glb.description: This pipeline utilises a marching cube algorithm to generate a 3D model from a series of CT scans. As it performs the segmentation based on Hounsfield units, it is agnostic to the specific body site.

lungDicom2glb.name: DICOM to segmented lung GLB generation
lungDicom2glb.title: Lungs segmentation
lungDicom2glb.info: Generate segmented lungs (without air way) glb mesh from dicom
lungDicom2glb.description: This pipeline segments the lungs and the airway from a series of CT scans.
